Actions.Text: -- Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmStartingPath to getvariable "local__OptionalStartingPath" instance kmInst	set kmPrompt to getvariable "local__OptionalPrompt" instance kmInstend tellset default_location to POSIX file kmStartingPath as aliasif kmPrompt is equal to "" then	set theOutputFolder to POSIX path of (choose folder default location (default_location))else	set theOutputFolder to POSIX path of (choose folder default location (default_location) with prompt kmPrompt)end ifreturn theOutputFolder
